text:
Progyny - Frontend / Backend - Salary, equity are all open to negotiation. I'm not involved in the actual $.

Location: New York, NYC

We are an IVF, egg freezing, and general fertility benefit & insurance startup that has already signed some very large enterprise customers (household names), and we're rapidly scaling all departments.

We have open positions for frontend developers, backend developers, and everything in between. PHP, Rails, are open as our stacks are mostly still in planning and development. Don't hesitate to apply. I'm on the engineering team.

Please apply through Workable:

https://progyny.workable.com/

Frontend:

https://progyny.workable.com/jobs/193492

Senior Developer:

https://progyny.workable.com/jobs/188814
